title: Enhancing Hospitality Practical Competencies: Game-Based IT Fluency Development: Practical Applications through Mod Creation

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and design optimization strategies for complex systems within games.
Through game mode creation, learners can implement content applying spatial representation, data structures, and algorithmic thinking.
Based on experiences hacking/modifying digital tools, learners can explain system error diagnosis and creative problem-solving methods.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
